entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Thursday 4 May 2023
